question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of breads has 175 calories per serving. If a 300 ounces bag has 5 servings, how many ouncess can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2050 and you have already consumed 1700 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2050 and I have consumed 1700 calories then I have 2050-1700 = <<2050-1700=350>>350 calories left to eat
If each serving of breads has 175 calories and I only have 350 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 350/175 of a serving = 2 of a serving
We also know that a 300 ounces bag of breads has 5 servings, hence each serving has 300 ounces/5 = <<300/5=60>>60 ouncess
If I can only eat 2 of a serving, then I can eat only 60 ounces * 2 = 120 ouncess
#### 120
